Keywords: Codex , Maximum Carnage , Monster
Real Name: Cletus Kasady
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Elevated, Hindering
CARNAGE SYMBIOTE: Absolute Carnage may start the game with [SVC] #s006 Carnage Symbiote equipped at no cost.
SPREADING MY SYMBIOTES ACROSS THE WORLD: Flurry, Giant Reach: 3. // When Absolute Carnage KO's an opposing character of 25+ points, after resolutions you may generate a [SVC] #011 Carnage Minion in that character's square.
MAXIMUM CARNAGE: Once per turn when Absolute Carnage hits, after resolutions deal 1 penetrating damage to up to 2 opposing characters that weren't hit but are adjacent to a hit character.
FEAR AND LOATHING, COMING FOR YOU!: Battle Fury, Leadership, Probability Control. // Other characters with the Maximum Carnage keyword modify attack +1.

Fun fact he power says " Other characters with the Maximum Carnage keyword modify attack +1." not friendy or opposing just Other characters so if you AND your opponent have anyone with the Maximum Carnage keyword they get the +1...... And that is how i played a game with a 15 Attack top clix Absolute Carnage.

spider_ham
I like this version of Carnage far better than the TMT colossal, which was cumbersome to transport, and rife for abuse due to a low point cost and the ease at which Symbiotes were generated. Nice sculpt!
September 15, 2020
GL_Alex
200 points like WF Kingdom Come Superman, and a totally deep brutal dial. I'm always fascinated when game pieces are similar points and just how the game changes over time with stats and sculpt details.
September 10, 2020
ArkhamInquirer
Prob and Giant Reach are going to help him quite a bit, so as far as 200 point melee-centric tentpoles go, Carnage here is pretty good. He'll absolutely shred through swarm teams with ease, or basically any other team that tries to bunch up. You'll have to be careful about popping out Carnage Minions though, since it might be an easy 30 points for your enemy to reclaim after they lose a piece. My only major gripes about Carnage are twofold, 1. He doesn't have a point value that plays well with the other members of the OG Maximum Carnage team. That bums me out. But I suppose we have the Fast Forces version for that. 2. He doesn't have a trait that allows the Maximum Carnage primes in this set to play together. Seems like a big oversight, since they're all part of the same storyline.
September 10, 2020
